email.title: Sponsors Exhibition - CV Submissions Now Open!
email.text:
Hey everyone!
DoCSoc's Sponsors Exhibition that attracts over 500 students each year has gone virtual on Hopin! It's taking place 1pm-4pm BST tomorrow (14th Oct). There'll be tons of companies to talk to, raffles and prizes to be won! You will receive an email with a link to join the event tomorrow at 12:45pm.
You can now submit your CV to be seen by our sponsors here:
http://cv.docsoc.co.uk/
By submitting, you will be entered with a chance to win an Amazon Echo Dot or Google Home Mini. 3 of each are up for grabs!
